text: Jürgen Reents (5 August 1949 – 7 April 2022) was a German politician and journalist. He was born in Bremerhaven, West Germany. He was a member of the Alliance 90/The Greens. He was in the Bundestag between 1983 until 1985. Reents died on 7 April 2022, aged 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Bremen (state) Category:German journalists
title: Jürgen Reents
